First off, I believe everyone is entitled to their own opinion and everyone should have a say in what they believe, however i do not believe Sharia Law should be a part of our legal system.
We should not introduce laws based on the Qur'an. Incorporating even part of Sharia Law undermines our own Justice System and British values.
We live in a great society - where men and woman are equal, all kinds of different people are accepted (homosexuals, transgender etc.). A fair society.

People are too quick to point the finger and say that disliking the Muslim religion and disagreeing with it - is racist. I think we need to realize, this isn't about any individual Muslim person or people, this is simply about the Religion and its old fashioned values. I encourage those who have not read the Qur'an or Sharia Laws - to read it and find out for yourself.

I think we should not allow any Sharia Laws incorporated into our Justice System or allow it into our society.
